name: MyCreature
description:
This game is a clicker where you have to take care of a sweet creature !

I made this game alone with Unity3D for the #1BitClickerJam

I didn't say all the truth, a friend of mine help me for the game design and music. If you like what it does you can follow him on twitter @corwel or soundcloud

Don't hesitate to make some comments below, I may update the game if you like it.
